metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13134 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: ImageMagick before 7.0.8-50 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function ReadVIFFImage in coders/viff.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> introduced by: https://github.com/ImageMagick/ImageMagick/commit/3b48d20df53ad048af05107aa1850c344466b082 in imagemagick6, the equivalent patch did not introduce the issue, so not affected: https://github.com/ImageMagick/ImageMagick6/commit/210474b2fac6a661bfa7ed563213920e93e76395

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
